alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Holmes; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 11:40AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Jackson, Gulf, eastern Bay, Calhoun and eastern Holmes Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida, eastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida and northwestern Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 1230 PM EDT/1130 AM CDT/... At 1138 AM EDT/1038 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Vernon to 15 miles east of Lynn Haven to Port St. Joe. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Marianna, Chipley, Graceville, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Orange, Bradford, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Cottondale, Altha, Alford, Wausau, Campbellton, Honeyville, Clarksville, Chipola Cutoff and Kern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Holmes; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington
